name: TelcoCustomerSegmentationPipeline
parameters: --var monthlyRevenue=1,2,3,4 --var roamingCalls=1,2,3,4,5 --var monthsInService=1,2,3,4 --var droppedCalls=1,2,3,4 --var workflow_14_inputcolumns=MonthlyRevenue,MonthlyMinutes,TotalRecurringCharge,OverageMinutes,ReceivedCalls,OutboundCalls,PeakCallsInOut,DroppedCalls,CallWaitingCalls,IncomeGroup,UniqueSubs,ActiveSubs,MonthsInService,OccupationIndex,MaritalStatusIndex,CreditRatingIndex --var modelName=m1 --var destinationPath=data/TELCO/Telco-Customer-Segmentation/Clustering-Test-Data --var model=m1

Explanation

  • This example demonstrates how to create a Workflow node by selecting a specific workflow identified by its UUID.

Example of Creating a Workflow Node with Spark Configuration and Notes

}

  • This example illustrates how to create a Workflow node while also specifying Spark configuration options and adding notes about the workflow's purpose.
